text: Umbone nganiuŵa pagalauchisya ngope syenu upande wa kungopoko ni kundiŵilo, nambo umbone (usyesyene) ni wa mundu jwankulupilile Allah, Lisiku Lyambesi, Malaika, Chitabu ni Achimitume, achipelekaga soni chipanje achichisakaga kwa ŵapaulongo, ŵawina, masikini, jwapaulendo, ŵakuŵenda, ni kwaapela ulukosyo achikapolo, achiswaliji soni Swala nikutolaga Zaka, ni ŵakwanilisya ilanga yao pati ataŵenemo, ni ŵakupilila pakulaga, pakulwala ni pandema jangondo, ŵanganyao niŵaasimichisye (Usilamu wao), soni ŵanyao niŵali ŵakun'jogopa (Allah)
